prompts.label: BIOLUMINESCENT JELLYFISH
prompts.prompt: Alien bioluminescent jellyfish and octopus creatures floating in deep space-ocean hybrid environment, ethereal glowing tentacles in electric blues and purples, organic flowing forms against infinite dark void, mysterious and hypnotic energy, photo-realistic but otherworldly, deep saturation on bioluminescent parts contrasting with dark background, sense of discovering something that shouldn't exist, National Geographic meets cosmic horror

prompts.label: ABSTRACT FLUID DYNAMICS
prompts.prompt: Abstract fluid art in motion, swirling liquid metal textures in deep teals and midnight blues, organic flowing forms creating hypnotic patterns, iridescent purple and cyan highlights, sense of continuous transformation and journey, macro photography of ink in water mixed with oil slicks, building complexity, immersive depth, feels like being inside the music itself

prompts.label: DEEP OCEAN MYSTERY
prompts.prompt: Deep sea trench photography, ancient alien architecture discovered on ocean floor, geometric patterns that feel both natural and constructed, ambient blue-green bioluminescence illuminating unknown structures, sense of vastness and isolation, photo-realistic documentary style but subject matter is impossible, makes you question what you're seeing, discovery of something beautiful and unknowable

prompts.label: HYPNOTIC JOURNEY MOMENTS
prompts.prompt: Long-exposure underwater photography capturing light trails from bioluminescent plankton, swirling patterns creating sense of movement and passage through space, deep indigo water with trails of cyan and electric blue light, meditative and trance-inducing, feels like 2am in a journey set when time stops mattering, cosmic yet intimate, pulling viewer deeper into the experience
